1.content: Let's choose the medium of animation first.
1.title: Big Beginnings

111.content: Nice choice, who's the giant wizard?
111.title: Fairy Tail

choices: Natsu picked you up for further inspection.
1111.content:
You'd been watching Fairy Tail for a while, reading the manga and even buying some merchandise. Needless to say you were a big fan. You enjoyed the series well enough, but one of the characters caught your eye every time he came onscreen: Natsu Dragneel himself.

You had a thing for sleeveless, sandal-wearing anime guys, so he was right up your alley. You had gone to sleep the night before, thinking about the pink haired stud as you drifted off. You woke up the next day with a giant headache... but there was something even more concerning... you were only an inch tall!

You looked around and saw nothing but giant blades of grass, the sun beamed down on you as you began to sweat.

"Where the hell am I...?" You muttered to yourself as you continued to walk aimlessly.

You began to feel small quakes beneath your feet, confused, you turned around to see a giant figure looming over you with something flying beside it. You immediately recognized him as Natsu, your eyes went wide as you stood in front of his sandal-clad feet. You could smell the stench coming off of them, it was overwhelming.

"Man, that was a hard job, eh Happy?" Natsu asked his blue cat friend.

"It was only hard for you because you can't handle train rides!" Happy chastised his dragon slayer partner.

"Yeah yeah, I'm just ready to get home and get some food in my belly!" Natsu patted his abs before looking down directly at you.

"Hey Natsu, what's that weird bug?" Happy asked.

"Hell if I know..."
1111.title: Natsu Dragneel

choices: Saw a tiny human on his sole
Stomped his foot and added more pressure
11112.content:
You paled suddenly as Natsu's face was soon blocked as he lifted up his foot and hovered his large sandal sole over you! It was littered with dirt and what looked to be the squashed bodies of tiny critters.

Natsu gave a toothy grin, putting his hands on his hips. "Better crush it though before it lays eggs!"

"Yeah smoosh em flat!", Happy cheered.

Like a missile, Natsu quickly stomped his foot down. You could only watch as the sandal covered more light and showed their treads intill-

SQUISH

You felt your heartbeat accelerate as your back was pressed to the ground and a large leather weight pinned you. Natsu was putting his weight on the foot that was meant to crush you, the pressure was noticeable as the sandal stomped down HARD onto you. Strangely you didn't feel like your bones were being crushed, all you felt was Natsu's giant form leaning on you.

Natsu chuckled as he completely covered the bug with his foot. "That's right, any bugs I cross you better expect a good round of crushing!"

The fire dragon slayer, wanting to crush the weird bug even more. Lifted up his heel and started grinding his sandal. Natsu suddenly looked confused as he only heard the graveling of dirt, no crunches.

"Ne Happy you hear anything?"

The exceed floated down and listened, crinkling his nose at the strong scent. Sure enough from the swiveling sandal there was a lack of sound to confirm you were crushed.

"All I hear is dirt, oh maybe it's a super bug!", Happy put on a thinking face.

Natsu frowned and lifted up his foot, turning it to look at his sandal's sole. Sure enough you stayed stuck to the leather scented sole, Natsu noticed the lack of a crushed body.

Soon Natsu.....
11112.title: Fire Dragon Stomp

1112.content:
( https://i.pinimg.com/236x/9f/53/85/9f538... )

Your name was Pod, a wizard and member of the guild Fairy Tail. Many people knew you as the Pint of the guild, fitting name as your magic was being a inch in height. The Small Magic as you called it, not only gave you your size but also a high durability.

This came in handy as while the guild was friendly and you considered them family, the bottom of feet and other body parts was a occurring sight in your sky.

Among your friends was a special someone, the ice mage Gray Fullbuster. He was a true bro and always helped you when needed. You wouldn't say it out loud but you do have a crush on him.

This crush was metaphorical and literal. There were numerous times when Gray find you stuck to his large sole or under his firm ass. Not to mention whenever he and Natsu got in their scuffles, falling on you and pressing you under their large muscles. Still you had grown a liking of being squashed, but that was another thing you were hesitant to admit.

It was the end of the day and many guild members had started heading home. This of course had you looking up at your buff manly guild mates as they stepped over you.

Still you were hesitant to go home. Usually you headed home when there was still light out. The sun had completely set and Magnolia Town had darkness coating.

You soon felt the ground shaking again, looking behind you was the large black shoes that occasionally flatten you. Looking up at the towering figure, you saw Gray shirtless and looking past his muscled torso at you with his hands on his hips.

The ice mage gave a smile to the speck before him. "Hey Pod, you heading home?"

You blushed at your crush's voice before nodding. You suddenly sighed remembering your predicament.

Gray suddenly crouched down, leaning on his knees and making his muscles flex. The black haired giant frowned at your look. "Is something wrong?"

Rubbing the back of your head you tried not looking at the muscular assets or the bulge clothed in black.

"A-ah...its just pretty dark and I'm a bit nervous to head back home!"

The shadow covering you darkened and you soon found yourself clenched in Gray's warm fist. The giant soon rised and slowly brought you up his buff torso before grinning at you with his dark eyes.

"Well if your scared, you can spent the night with me."

"Really?"

Gray nodded as he stood up and unconsciously flexed his muscles as he stretched. "Yeah it's no problem squirt. We can hang and have some fun."

You grew excited as you thought of what fun awaited you.

As the ice mage exited the guild hall, he looked down at your head poking out of his fist. "Its kinda cold out, how about I put you somewhere warm?", Gray grew a small smirk as he bounced his pecs.

Where did Gray put you?
1112.title: Gray Fullbuster

choices: Something happened on the way there.
11122.content:
https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773...

Gray looked at his pecs before glancing over at his right arm. A sly look grew on Gray's face as he stretched his arm up, revealing his hairy, sweaty armpit to you.

Gray always liked teasing you for your size, even though he cared about you, he still had a mischievous side to him. He would often squish you under his bare feet or sit on you "accidentally," but it was obvious that he liked to have fun with your tiny body.

"My pit will be warm enough, right Pod?"

You blushed as you stared at the buff wizard's giant armpit. "U-uh, yeah, that sounds good."

Gray brought you up to his damp armpit and let you get a good look at the wall of smelly skin and hair. Usually when you ended up in his armpit, it was because he'd fallen on you, but now you got to get a nice look of it.

"Sorry about the smell little man, today's mission was rough." Gray said before casually pressing you against his pit.

You were squashed into the shoft, squishy skin as Gray rubbed you around. His smell was strong, it smelled like the scent of a hard working wizard. You couldn't help but take deep breaths as Gray grinded you into his warm pit.

"I think that'll be enough to make sure you don't accidentally fall out," Gray began to lower his arm.

You were smushed between Gray's muscles and armpit, trapped in the dark forest of Gray's armpit hair as the ice wizard began to walk home. Occasionally, Gray would squeeze his arm to his side to feel your small body between his pits.

Soon...
11122.title: Ice Pit

1113.content: Even more wizards you say?
1113.title: More FT Guys

11131.content:
http://imgur.com/a/GLZCdHs

You were a new mage in the Fairy Tail guild, an.... interesting member to say the least. You were cursed a long time ago, leaving you the size of a bug; you'd met most of the members except for the famous Iron Dragon Slayer Gajeel.

You got along with the members fine, you'd made friends with Natsu Dragneel and Gray Fullbuster, although Natsu was a bit too rough with you at times.

After most of the wizards left the guild, you were left with Natsu and Gray before they found a job to take. You were about to leave the empty guild hall, you reached the large doors and you were about to slip underneath them when they suddenly opened, revealing a shirtless male with long black hair and metal decorating his face.

"That must be Gajeel, he's more handsome than I thought!" You thought.

"Damn, must've spent longer on that job than I thought." He sighed.

You looked up at him, his massive muscles bulging as he rubbed the back of his head.

"Hey! I'm the newest member of Fairy Tail!" You shouted, getting his attention.

Gajeel looked down at you with confusion, "Huh? A little runt like you?" He smirked.
11131.title: Gajeel Redfox

choices: Putting you on the ground and raising his boot over you
Placing you on a seat he planned to sit on
111312.content:
The hot smirking face was sudden covered as Gajeel brought his large hand down and grabbed the back of your coat with his thumb and finger.

The black haired giant smirked as he dangled you in front of his face.

"Heh if you didn't call up I'd probably crush ya under my boot!", Gajeel's sharp teeth showed as he lifted up his heel and swiveled the boot into the floor.

You shuddered at the threatening yet hot words. "Well I'm really tough! I get stepped on a lot!"

Gajeel chuckled as he brought you closer and licked his lips. "So you got squashed a few times, but tell me. Ever end up in a dragon slayer's gut?"

The warm breath hit you and made you blush as you saw the tongue and waiting gullet. Gajeel smirked as he suddenly opened his maw wide and let the steamy air flow out.

A deep chuckle came as Gajeel close his mouth into a smirk, he suddenly tossed you into the air before catching you in a firm fist. The iron dragon slayer brought up a arm and flexed his large bicep with a grunt.

"I'll skip the "nice to meet you" crap and offer a test instead. Show me how tough a runt is, or prove that your just an ant to crush!

Gajeel started his test by......
111312.title: A Tiny Test

choices: Gajeel took you out, time to visit the pits
Gajeel continues to test your strength between his pecs.
1113121.content:
Gajeel licked his lips before puffing his chest out and bouncing his pecs in front of you.

"Let's see how well ya hold up between these bad boys!" Gajeel laughed as he sat down and brought you up to the crevice between the giant muscles.

You blushed as Gajeel tucked you between the warm muscles and flexed them tight, "Surprised you didn't pop right away!"

You were compressed in between Gajeel's pecs as the giant dragon slayer stretched his arms behind his head and propped his booted feet up on a table in front of him. As Gajeel stretched his arms up, his pecs squeezed you tightly as you were coated in his sweat. Gajeel bounced his pecs, squashing you back and forth between them.

"Heh, don't slip out, didn't realize I was this drenched!" Gajeel chuckled before looking into his exposed armpits to see sweat flowing down the hairy patches of skin.
1113121.title: Tough as Iron

choices: Gajeel made you lick his pit.
Gajeel put his arm down, trapping you there.
11131211.content:
Gajeel smirked widely and reached in between his pecs, plucking you up his one of his muscular arms still raised.

"Change of plans, bug, next you have to endure my stink AND my muscles." He said in a cocky tone as you looked down at the wide stretch of fuzzy skin.

The scent hit you, causing you to blush as Gajeel dangled you above the pit.

"Get a whiff of that, it's the scent of a real man." Gajeel said evilly before dropping you into his opened pit.

You landed in the center of the pit face first. Gajeel grinned toothily before pressing you down into it, grinding you under his giant finger as you were buried in his warm, sweaty pit.
11131211.title: In the pits

11132.content:
( https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/fair... )

You huffed as you sat in front of the giant wooden doors, the sun had gone down and barely anyone was walking on the streets of Magnolia town.

Now to anyone, making a walk across down was bound to tire them out. It was even more difficult for you being only a inch tall. The giant doors belonged to the guild Fairy Tail, a infamous guild you hoped to join.

It all began when you were watching T.V back home, surprisingly you were watching a anime with the same guild name. Fairy Tail was a constant watch for you, and one nap later you find yourself a inch tall in the same train station as episode 1.

After nearly getting stepped on by Natsu and going unnoticed you decided it would be best to find the titular guild and seek help.

Sliding under the door, rather then friendly commotion the guild was seemingly empty.

"Damn did everyone go home? I did get here late..."

You were interrupted from your thoughts as the ground started shaking. Heavy thumps pounded the floor and nearly knocked you down. Looking up, your eyes widened as a large figure was walking towards the door and you!

The giant had spiky blond hair and a distinctive lightning scar on his handsome face. He was shirtless, giving a view of his muscular bod and guild mark. His large brown shoes pounded the floor as they carried the muscular weight.

It was Laxus Dreyar! You were a bit embarrassed to admit that you had a small crush on him. His personality and looks were a contributor. Speaking of crush....

Laxus stopped right before the door, his big booted feet were on both sides of you and made you feel truly puny. Looking up, you could barely see Laxus' face over his large pecs.

The handsome giant soon looked down and his familar smirk grew.

"Ah a bug, trying to be a guild member are ya? Well sorry to say but the only place you'll be joining is underneath my foot crushed!"

You felt a chill as Laxus lifted up one of his large feet and hovered the boot over you, the stomper slowly descended as if to draw out your fear.

"W-WAIT I'm not a bug!", you desperately shouted.

Laxus........
11132.title: Laxus Dreyar

111322.content:
You ran as fast as you could as the gigantic boot got closer and closer. You managed to duck out of the way before Laxus slammed his booted foot down and grinded it back and forth.

The giant, muscular blonde looked over to see you running away, "Heh, fast for a shrimp." He stomped over to you and bent down behind you.

A giant shadow engulfed you as you turned around to see Laxus' body looming over you.

"Don't crush me!" You begged.

Laxus laughed evilly as you watched sweat drip down his massive muscles.

"I think I found some other uses for you, runt." Laxus reached down and grabbed you in a tight fist before standing up, "I think I'll take you home and use you until you break." He licked his lips.

You trembled in the giant's hand, if he wanted to he could squash you between his massive hands like a grape. Laxus puffed his chest out before grinning devilishly.

"Now let's find a good spot to keep you for the ride home."
111322.title: Close Call

1113221.content:
Laxus sneered at you before he suddenly bounced both his pecs, the large muscles made the sweat drops fly off.

"I think I've got the perfect place for you squirt. Somewhere nice and warm for that puny body."

You were suddenly released from the tight fist as Laxus used his thumb and finger to hold you up by your shirt. He then started bringing you to his firm chest, despite the fear you couldn't help but blush at the tattooed muscles.

"W-wait please-"

"Can it runt! Your my bug now, and I don't hesitate to crush bugs that annoy me.", Laxus threatened with a smirk.

Soon the lightning dragon slayer pushed your squirming body between his large pecs. Laxus smirked as he bounced his pecs again and got a pained yelp from you.

The pecs were sweaty and squeezed their musk into you with crushing pressure. The booming heartbeat around you sped up, signifying Laxus's excitement.

"Comfy?", Laxus mockingly said as he exited the guild and felt his pecs sliding back and forth, getting pained groans from you as you were mashed up.

"Alright bug listen up, I expect you to do what I say. Behave yourself or I'll have a nice red tattoo on my chest. Also this won't be the worst, I'm already thinking of other ways to crush you."

Laxus chuckled darkly as he bounced his pecs and crossed his large arms over his chest. "Just remember that your mine."

The mage then...
1113221.title: The Lightning Pecs

choices: Laxus closed his armpit, squashing you into it.
Laxus continued using you as a tiny deodorant stick.
11132212.content:
After a bit of Laxus squishing you in between his muscular pecs on his way home, he arrived at his house and grinned as he closed the door behind him.

"How'd you enjoy the trip back, maggot?" Laxus plucked you from the crevice between his muscles and held you between two fingers.

You didn't know how to respond, the giant blonde's muscles were nice, but you were sore from the pressure of Laxus squeezing you between them. Laxus smirked and popped his boots off, leaving his giant feet exposed.

"Can't even speak, huh?" Laxus asked cockily before laying back on his bed and holding you up above his body.

Laxus rested his free arm behind his head, giving you a view of his sweaty armpit as he rolled you around between his fingers.

"Please let go of me, I'll do anything you want if you set me free!" You begged, although you were in an unfamiliar world, you'd take your chances with finding someone more helpful.

"Anything? How nice of you." Laxus mocked, "How about instead I just do what I want with you until you pop?"

You coughed as Laxus' body odor seeped into the air.

"Please, I don't want to become a slave and be crushed! I can't do anything at my size anyway..."

"I have a good idea." Laxus said threateningly before lowering you down to his exposed armpit and dropping you in the damp, smelly pocket of flesh.

http://imgur.com/a/iMkfVP2

You coughed and gagged as you hit the squishy skin underneath Laxus's arm, small blonde hairs pricked you as Laxus lifted a finger and pressed you against his odorous skin, rubbing you up and down the stretch of skin as you were coated in sweat.
11132212.title: Breaking the New Slave

choices: You were starting to enjoy the torture
The pressure was getting to you
111322121.content:
"Alright time to kick up the juice!", Laxus smirked as he lowered his muscled arm and felt his bicep press you into his squishy pit.

You groaned as your body was created a mold in the armpit as the large firm wall pushed you into it. The musky b.o was covering your body and the odorous sweat was drenching him.

"How's it feel, I gotta say I'm loving it! Even my pit can crush you. Get used to it cause I think I'm gonna relax for a bit.", Laxus chuckled maliciously as he crossed his biceps and closed his eyes.

Laxus wasn't asleep, evident as he would occasionally slide his arm back and forth to squash you harder into the musky pit.

"Wonder what we'll do next? Stompin you like a bug is tempting not to mention seeing how comfy you'll be as a seat cushion. Lots of crushing to look forward to, I'd start praying if I were you.", Laxus cruelly taunted you as he turned on his side, now squashing you between two firm walls.

"Your squirming's died down a little. Guess a bug knows how giants treat those beneath them!"

Your panicked squirming had slowed because....
111322121.title: A Pitiful Bug

choices: Let you lick his other pit clean.
Took you out and threw you to his feet.
Took you out and lowered his pants...
1113221211.content:
As odd as it was, you were actually beginning to like being squashed into the giant man's pit. The two walls of warm skin grinded you back and forth, even Laxus' scent was beginning to grow on you, it's not like you could get out of the situation anyway, you might as well learn to enjoy being his tiny plaything.

Laxus was still on his side, smushing you under his weight as he felt a small lick on his pit.

"Heh, good bug, clean my pits good and maybe I'll let you sleep in em'." Laxus smirked.

You couldn't believe you were actually licking Laxus' gross pit, you rubbed your tongue across the short hairs and sweaty skin. You had to admit, if Laxus was more gentle with you, you'd be enjoying the torture more. Even so you were mostly trying to appeal to your new owner... or did you secretly like being squashed by the muscular wizard?

Laxus rolled onto his back and lifted his arm up to see you lapping up his pit sweat.

"Finally givin' in huh? Looks like I broke you in a different way!" Laxus laughed.

You stopped for a second and looked up at his smirking face, "If I do what you want will you let me live? I don't want to be crushed!" You tried to make your plea again.

Laxus licked his lips, "I'll keep you alive as long as you please me, I can't get too soft yet, bug boy. Maybe if you behave and obey me like a good squirt I won't squash you to death, get it?" He asked threateningly.

"Yeah..." You sighed, even if you were realizing that you liked the torment to some degree, you were hoping that this was the chance for your giant kidnapper to lighten up a bit.

"You have to earn the respect of a GIANT, shrimpy, if you prove to be strong enough to serve me then maybe we'll work out some kinda deal, but for now you're still a bug to me." Laxus pressed you against his pit with his finger, "And right now I want you to finish your job."

Looks like you still have a bit to go before Laxus respects you at your size. You began to lick the giant pit again, occasionally Laxus would lower his arm and flex his bicep, squashing you for fun.

Eventually, Laxus...
1113221211.title: Turning Point

1113311.content: Scenario 1: Romeo's Awakening: One day after Romeo had been beaten yet again by Natsu in a spar, caused him to strive to get better and become the strongest person in the world, and as he was training, he felt a sensation from inside himself that fed off of that drive, and curious about it, decided to pull upon that power and what happens would give him all that he wanted and more...
1113311.title: Growth Scenario

11133111.content:
Romeo Conbolt huffed in annoyance as he kicked a rock, sending it flying out of the forest clearing.

"I can't believe Natsu-Nii beat me again! Argh, and I trained really hard!", Romeo huffed as he dropped to the floor and started to to push ups.

"I...need...to be....the...STRONGEST!", Romeo yelled out as he flopped against the ground.

The young Conbolt rolled on his back and sighed as the sun beat down on him. "Natsu-Nii is so strong, I wanna beat him so bad...but all my training barely does anything!"

Romeo widened his eyes as a sudden strange feeling came over him. It was like....a sense of determination and heavy drive. The doubtful feeling vanished and Romeo grinned as he got up and wipped sweat from his forehead.

"Alright...I can to this. I'm gonna beat Natsu!"

During his sudden triumphant yell, Romeo failed to notice his clothes feeling tighter then before. In addition the sun must have gotten hotter as more sweat started to form on the young boy's body.

Soon......
11133111.title: Romeo's Awakening

choices: Romeo decides to go into the city to challenge Natsu
Romeo decides to train some more.
111331112.content:
As Romeo was getting pumped from the flow of energy that permeated his entire being, he elected to then go into one of the training grounds near the city, and practice some more on the training dummies growing slowly all the while.

It was when he summoned his flames into his right arm as he punched into it, looking on with amazement when he tore through it with ease as the flames burnt it to a crisp.

"Holy crap! Never had that happen before, hehe, whatever the heck just happened, I feel a lot stronger, maybe enough to take on big bro Natsu!" He declared happily as he stretched his arms into the air, as he was caught up in his excitement he didn't realize his shirt was tightening even more against his chiseled torso as sweat flowed down the contours of his body, he sniffed the air a bit smelling his pit's rather prominent odor as he chuckled a bit in amusement, "Heh, must've worked pretty hard to work up this kind of sweat." He mused.

Though his size had made some headway as he was several inches taller than he used to be, with him adjusting his scarf thinking he wrapped it too tightly as he wiggled his toes inside his tighter boots, as he smiled at the other dummies, there was still so much more work to do~
111331112.title: Romeo heads into training

choices: There a sudden large shift of growth
1113311122.content:
Romeo pumped his arms and felt energy course through his biceps. The muscle seem to grow with the flexing.

"Alright, let's see how much power I've got in a punch!"

Charging forward with mighty steps, Romeo punched a dummy straight in half with his bare hand. The young boy grinned as he clenched his hand and felt sweat fall down his muscles.

"Wow I didn't even use my flames! I must be getting stronger!", Romeo laughed as he crossed his strong arms.

The sudden tightness in his shoes so became more noticable as he felt his sole about to pop off the bottom. Romeo looked down questionably at his bulging boots, he didn't give them much mind as he reached down and pulled off the footwear.

"Ah that's better....speaking of feet.", Romeo rose his leg and delivered a powerful kick to completely knock off a training dummy's head.

Romeo then placed his large foot on the dummy to stomp it into the ground. The conbolt grinned cockily as he thought of eventually being able to pin down Natsu.

As the young boy started practicing his offensive attacks, he didn't take notice of the dummies getting lower. Romeo was soon standing to where the training equipment couldn't reach his pecs.

Next...
1113311122.title: Training And Growth

11133111221.content:
As Romeo continued his training, he realized that as he was doing it, he didn't feel no small amount of fatigue on his body, usually after training this long he'd feel winded but he felt like he can go on for at least several hours or more!

Feeling particularly adventurous, he walked over to a nearby tree with a confident grin on his face as he braced himself and wrapped his arms around the tree and heaved, his biceps bulging strongly, as he grunted with effort as he felt the tree crack and pull a bit from the ground until he roared and with a strong pull, hoisted the tree out of the ground like corn and threw it over, as it landed with a thump.

Romeo grinned excitedly at the feat of strength he just pulled as he could feel that potential within his body just begging to be unleashed more, "Heh, I'm getting pretty strong now huh?" He mused as he licked his lips idly at the power he wielded, raising his arm to flex his bicep to see that mound of muscle before him swell up, being able to crush boulders between them as a matter of fact, as his bulge twitched a bit at the thought.

"But I can't stop now, gotta get stronger!" He declared to himself, before Romeo felt that sensation of power pour through his body once again, as a sort of dark blue aura was projected around his body he felt his muscles tighten slightly before relaxing as Romeo then began to expand in size drastically, as his clothes slowly tore themselves off his body save for his shorts and boxers which pressed tightly against his body ironically enough.

It would seem that Romeo's latest growth spurt would make him expand to...
11133111221.title: There a sudden large shift of growth

1113312.content:
Scenario #1: The Tiny friend

One of Romeo's friends comes to visit him at the guild, a boy with the power of size shifting magic. However, his magic goes haywire and he ends up an inch tall! The Conbolt could help his friend or have his fun. Or who knows, maybe he will join his friend in tiny hood.

Scenario #2: The Tiny Conbolt

Being a active young boy, Romeo tends to get himself into troublesome situations at times. One of these situations is him grabbing a mystical stone off limits, a stone that shrinks those who touch it. Romeo's now going to have an adventure of dodging feet and trying to get a giant's attention.
1113312.title: Shrinking Scenario

choices: Took you out of his pecs
11133121.content:
Your name was Minu, a short teen wizard who lives in Magnolia town. It was a sunny hot day as you walked through town, a particular destination in mind.

A tall building in the distance sped up your walking and a grin grew on your face as you spotted a familar face near the entrance and called out. "Romeo!"

Romeo Conbolt was hanging out in front of the Fairy Tail Guild, prepared to set off to train a little. The black haired boy wiped some sweat off his forehead when he heard his name being called. Romeo grinned as he saw you running up to him.

"Hey Minu! What's up?"

You soon stopped in front of your friend. Now your short form showed as you only went half way up Romeo's chest, a sight often causing flushes due to being leveled with the muscular chest.

Looking up, you smiled. "I've been practicing with my magic, I wanted to show you!"

Romeo toothily grinned and put his hands on his hips. "Awesome! Come on show me!"

Nodding, you soon took a breath and concentrated. A grayish magical circle glowed beneath you as your whole body glowed the grayish color.

Opening your eyes, the whole world had taken a literal HUGE turn. In front of you were a familar pair of brown shoes, the toes were as big as a house. Going up was a pair of tall legs leading to a torso, clothed in a vest opened to reveal firm abs. You blushed as the face of your friend was slightly blocked by his large pecs.

"Huh? Minu where'd you go?", Romeo looked around in confusion. A dim glow down below made him glance down and widened his eyes as before his feet in a tiny magic circle was his now speck of a friend.

You fell onto your butt the gigantic Romeo crouched down, his booming voice hitting you like strong winds. "Whoa that's so cool!"

Romeo suddenly reached down, engulfing you in a warm fist. Standing up, Romeo brought you up his muscular torso before grinning at your head sticking out of his fist.

You smiled while trying to suppress your flush. "T-thanks, I call it Downsize. I can shrink down and increase my durability."

Romeo suddenly had a look of thought, before he grinned widely. Tugging his scarf off fully uncovered Romeo's firm chest, the fist soon lowered to where you found yourself facing the canyon crevice and picking up the smell of b.o.

"So this wouldn't hurt you?", Romeo's question soon revealed its context as the black haired boy pressed you into his pecs.

You were shocked as Romeo pushed you between the two large walls of muscle. The pecs as they were now already were squeezing you as the bodily musk surrounded you.

Romeo chuckled as he put his hands on his hips and looked down at his chest. "Hehe wow Minu your really a shortie now!", the muscular boy suddenly bounced his pecs, feeling your tiny body get crushed between his buff muscles.

Despite the increased pressure and walls of muscles squeezing you up and down. You weren't in any pain, the worst effect of Romeo's pec crunching was the blush forming from the boy's muscles and smelly stench.

Soon Romeo....

choices: Ed woke up and noticed you under his arm.
Ed woke up... but didn't notice you.
1131.content:
You woke up, feeling dizzy and with a massive headache. You rubbed your eyes and looked around, but you couldn't see a thing. Reaching for the lamp next to your bed, you felt nothing.

"Hello?!" You shouted, but nobody answered you.

Suddenly, you felt a massive quake underneath you before a light flickered on. You instantly realized that everything was massive to you, including a rather short-looking (but still huge to you) male with long blonde hair in a braid. The male, who wore a black tank top, leaped onto his bed and sighed as he stretched out.

"Hey!" You recognized him... but you couldn't put your finger on it.

He didn't hear you, so you made your way to his bed... Ed began to snore soon after.

"Guess I have to climb this now..." You sighed as you made your way up.

After what felt like hours, you made it to the top of the bed and walked over to the blonde giant.

"Hey! Wake up!" You screamed.

Ed looked as if he was getting up.. but he was rolling over, onto you!

"Wait!" You screamed as his muscular body loomed above you.

You tried to run... but it didn't work, he'd landed on you, and the worst part is that you were squished underneath his fuzzy armpit! You gagged as the giant, soft flesh grinded you into the mattress, he was still snoring, and apparently it was a hot night since his pit was damp and odorous. In a desperate attempt to wake him up, you began to tickle him.

Eventually...
1131.title: Edward and Alphonse Elric

11312.content:
Ed groaned as he pressed himself to the bed squishing you more and immobilizing you to where you couldn't move to tickle him. Laying down, Ed let out a yawn as he stretched his toned arms not taking notice of a speck plastered to his pit.

The alchemist ran a hand through his long hair undoing his braid, humming before growing a toothy grin. "Hope i have the dream from yesterday, heh bunch of shorties!"

Ed coincidentally was thinking about a dream he had being a giant and towering over the city. The long haired boy soon lowered his arm, you paled as you were soon smooshed between two walls the squishy pit and the muscular arm. The sour odor was even stronger as the sweat smeared over you.

Looking over to the bed beside his, Ed smiled as Al slept peacefully and breathed steady. Ed soon whistled as his nose caught a strong scent.

"Man i sweat up a storm tonight!", Ed threw the covers over to lay in his tank top and short, flapping his shirt to let the strong sweaty b.o flow out. Sweat dripped down his toned torso and Ed chuckled as he caught a whiff of his pit smell.

Sliding his pit back and forth produced a squelching noises as you were rolled around in the smelly prison being squashed. The scent was quite strong and thick with a true scale of just how big he was.

Ed swayed his large sweaty feet, quite smelly from being stuffed in his clunky boots.

Soon....
11312.title: Pit Prison

choices: The boot sole about to come down!
11331.content:
Your name was Ian, a 17 year old who used to have a normal life. Unfortunately strange circumstances rose in the form of a freak alchemy accident facing you. A group of strange cultists had kidnapped you and tried to use human transmutation in a bizarre ritual with you as a sacrifice.

The ritual was a failure with all the cultist being killed as their souls were torn from their bodies. You were spared but strangely faced a different outcome, your body was reduced in size to an inch tall. It was a shock and you had to struggle to survive when the military investigated the scene and nearly crushed you under their boots.

Taken in as a ward/pet of the military you were to be watched by the colonel Roy Mustang. You were nervous about about being watched by a giant, especially the handsome dark haired man you saw in photos.

You were set on the floor of the office, waiting for Mustang to arrive and finally meet you. Intimidation already filled you at all the gigantic furniture surrounding you. Light tremors soon began to thump the ground and you looked towards the towering door as tbe knob began to turn.

Roy sighed as he walked into his office. He had many thoughts running through his head about the ward he was going to be watching. Ian was a shrunken boy who had no clear future of returning to normal, the alchemy that did so was strange enough as is. Still he felt an urge to protect the tiny, like a natural instinct as a giant. Roy rose an eyebrow as his desk was bare, where did they put you?

You looked up in awe at the huge form of Roy Mustang, his large booted feet led up to his blue clothed body. From the looks of it he might be hiding some muscle under there. The handsome man was swaying his head seeming to look for something. A blush crept of your face as you furiously tried to shake it off.

Suddenly a shadow casted over you, looking up you saw.....
11331.title: Roy Mustang

choices: Armstrong slid you between his pecs
You and the giant major talked
11332.content:
You groaned as you began to gain consciousness. The last memories you had were a blur all you could think of was being at home and suddenly blacking out. The surface below you was wood like and smooth, like that of a table but it couldn't be a table as it seem to stretch out a great distance.

Suddenly the ground began to vibrate, not like an earthquake but rhythmic like..footsteps. The shaking got more intense and soon from behind a large dark shadow casted over you. A booming wave sudden hit you with a deep voice from the heavens.

"Ah thank goodness you've finally awakened!", the titanic voice nearly knocked you down from just how large it was.

Looking behind you and up, your eyes widened as coming down from the sky was a gigantic palm from a rough looking hand. Before you knew it the large hand wrapped around you in a fist, encasing you in the warm palm. As you were brought up uou saw the giant was wearing a blue military uniform, it seem to be hugging a large build as it curved around the huge muscles of this titan.

Finally you were brought to the face of the giant, you blushed as you took in his thick neck, handsome face, and blue eyes. The giant seem to...sparkle as he saw your head sticking out of his fist.

"I'm so glad i spotted you, i had almost stepped on you but luckily i saw your bright clothes!", The giant seem to have manly tears as he recounted the encounter.

You paled at that, looking over the edge of the fist you could see the towering body end at a pair of boots that could've crushed you. You awkwardly chuckled as you met the large man's eyes.

"Yeah heh, um...pardon me for asking but who are you?", you sweated as the warm fist heated you up.

The giant smiled before suddenly flexing both of his arms. As you were brought into the air in the fist your eyes widened as the military top suddenly was gone, your blush returned as your saw just how muscular this giant was. From his bulging biceps to his huge pecs this was the definition of a manly body!

"I am major Armstrong, it's a pleasure to meet you.", Armstrong bowed his head to you as his muscles flexed with the slightest movement.

You tried to shake off your blush before looking up to the mustached man. Telling Armstrong your name the man suddenly began bringing you to his chest. Pressing you to his huge firm pec, Armstrong crossed his huge arms across his chest as if giving a giant huge.

Not only was the pressure from the massive muscles squeezing you a lot but a sweaty b.o smell was coming from the bulky body of Armstrong. Though having such muscles was bound to built up a lot up sweat.

"I must say you rather adorable little one, I've never hugged someone this small before!", Armstrong mused.

Soon...
11332.title: Alex Louis Armstrong

choices: Urushihara feels twitching in his sole
115322.content:
Your name was George, a seemingly normal human at first. It was only when others heard of your background and saw you and person that led to shock.

The place of your birth was an entirely different world, a group of continents called Ente Isla. You were born a inch tall, being a orphan it was unknown the cause of this birth defect. It was always assumed to be a curse as humans had enough problems as is. Your size actually came in handy as the demon conquest of the continents began, you were able to hide easily and avoid harm.

With the pushback to the castle of Satan, a strange occurrence happened. You ended up unintentionally getting involved in a botched attempt to create a portal. Being stranded tiny in a new world was definitely a more difficult existence.

Luckily you had a special magic within you. It allowed you to detect magic auras. While weak you were able to sense the strong demonic energy, while it would be considered mad to actively search for the demon king or his generals it was all you had.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You panted as you stood in front of the towering door, a few days of dodging feet, cars, and this world's animals had been an exhausting ordeal. But finally the door to the home of the most fearsome beings in the old world awaited you. Should you beg, be confident and bold. A normal human is one thing but you were weak to your larger species.

The door in front of you suddenly opened, thooms in the ground had you nearly fall a large mass landed before you. Looking up the color drained from your face as looming above was a purple headed boy with one eye showing. People often spoke of the generals and if you weren't wrong then this was the fallen angel Lucifer!

The purple eye of the giant suddenly looked down at you, immediately the fear inceeased. "U-um demon general I'm sorry to intrude but i wish to ask..."

You trailed off your words as the shadow covering you darkened, looking up your eyes bulged as the giant rose one of his large feet over you. Before you could even shout the foot came down and you found yourself being thrown to the ground with a heavy and sweaty pressure squishing you down.

Urushihara grunted he leaned into the foot he just stomped down. "Stupid bugs.", lifting up his heel the fallen angel began to swivel his foot to ensure he throughly crushed the 'bug'. A audible squish noise came as the soft sole pressed the giant's weight onto you.

After squishing down on his foot again, Urushihara brought his attention up as he scanned the area around the door. The purplenette sighed as he walked back in, unaware of the twitching speck smooshed into the ball of his foot.

Plopping down in front of his computer, Urushihara looked at the webpage groaning. "They said it was gonna arrive today.", the fallen angel was hoping he'd get his delivery before Maou or Ashiya got back.

You groaned as your front was squished into the soft sole quite a bit. Miraculously you weren't reduced to a jumble of crunches, almost like your endurance was high. But you weren't thinking about that as you inhaled the smelly foot odor from the giant's foot.

Soon...
115322.title: Lucifer (Urushihara)

1153221.content:
Urushihara sighed, oblivious that the tiny 'bug' that he'd squashed was you. The giant male eventually notcied a small twitch coming from his foot and looked down to see what was causing in... only to see the shape of a tiny human smushed into his plump foot.

"What the hell?" Urushihara peeled you off of his foot and pinched you between his fingers.

"T-Thank goodness you noticed me!" you coughed as Urushihara stared at you with a confused look.

"What are you supposed to be? I didn't think that humans could get any lamer," Urushihara smirked as he squeezed you between the giant fingers.

"I-I'm from Ente Isla.... my name's George and-"

"Whatever," Urushihara cut you off. "So you came here for help, huh? Bad luck little dude, I don't have enough magic to open the gate."

"W-Well... do you think I can stay here? I can't go anywhere else here at this size..." you asked nervously.

"Hm? Of course you can stay here," Urushihara grinned and rested his free arm behind his head.

"Thank you!"

Urushihara's sleeve dropped to reveal his fuzzy, sweaty pit. "You can stay riiiiiight here."

Before you could understand what he was saying, Urushihara slammed you into his giant pit. You gagged as your body sank into the soft, smelly flesh as he smushed you against his pit.

You cringed as your body was coated with sweat, the giant fallen angel laughed as he grinded you against his armpit.
1153221.title: An Unwelcomed Guest

choices: Started snuggling into the pit (Strangely you liked the smelly torture)
Started squirming (You hated the musky prison)
11532211.content:
The fallen angel smugly grinned as your tiny body not only became tangled in greasy pit hairs put you began to stick as Urushihara rubbed you in like deodorant.

"Hope you don't mind the smell shrimp, haven't gotten a chance to wash up.", Urushihara chuckled as he removed his finger and found you stuck. "Heh guess i got my own human deodorant!"

You groaned as half your body was sunk into the squishy flex, the overwhelming sour musk heated your nostrils up as you were forced to endure the massive odor. The shadow covering the armpit started to darken as the purplenette lowered his arm, soon a more firm yet sweaty wall was pressing you more into the pit. You were sealed inside the cavern of the hot pit as the two walls squished you.

"Alright you chill out right there, don't be annoying and I'll let you out....maybe. Then again you do feel pretty good squished like a bug.", Urushihara smirked as he rubbed his arm back and forth before pressing it to his body. The giant licked his lips as he felt your puny form being squashed like sweat in his rank pit.

As the fallen angel began browsing his computer again you laid trapped encased in sweaty and musky flesh. The warm pit squelched as sweat soaked you while emitting its musky air.

You soon...

Free! was an anime you grew love for. You had always loved to swim and watching the animated swim teams zooming through the water made your heart flutter. One particular character you adored was Haru the freestyle swimmer. His stoic attitude not to mention amazing body made him your favorite.

After finishing an episode, you drifted off to sleep and wished that Haru was real...

Waking up, you noticed that your bed was replaced with that of a cool tile like ground. Opening your eyes you gasped as your environment was that of a giant bathroom! It was oddly familiar as the massive white wall of the tub loomed over.

The door opening left you in awe as with booming steps entering the bathroom was Haru now a giant, or you were actually tiny. The raven haired teen was wearing his black and purple swimsuit, letting his toned body be exposed. His stoic face seem to brighten as he saw the tub filled with water. Haru began to walk towards the tub and your neck hurt as you looked at his body stretching into the sky. The ground shaking stopped as both of his large feet planted themselves so you were in between them.

11533111.content:
Haru began raising his foot to plant it firmly in the water, but stopped mid-air. He stayed like that for a few minutes. You weren't sure why until you saw the glint of a blue eye fixated on where you stood.

He couldn't have notice you, especially with a body of water in front of him, could he?

Haruka placing his foot back down on the cold floor, the ground shaking as he slowly bending down on one knee told you otherwise. Fearing instinctively for your life at this size lead you to try to run away, but no avail as the speed you were going meant he didn't need to exert any work in grabbing you.

Now the raven haired swimmer was reaching forth with his left hand to take you into his grasp. Yet still you tried to escape. Heading straight into the corner of the tub like a headless chicken. As massive long pillars surrounded your body, wrapping you tightly in their grip like a serpent strangling its prey. Your hands held tight to your sides as you were raised into the sky in the massive fist, brought forward to Haru's face.

The blue eyed teen looked at you curiously before something clicked, mouth opening as if he recalled something.

"Oh that's right. You're my..."

You groaned as you woke up, feeling as if you just fell off a train. That couldn't be the case though as the surface below you was soft and cushioning like that of a bed. Confusion hit you as the blacket like surface spread for seemingly miles around you.

As you turned to take in more of thd landscape you gasped as the saw the area beyond the field of the soft ground. It was a bedroom giant sized and the surface you were on was a bed!

Before you could evaluate this situation more the door to the room opened and a large figure entered. "Oh no school starts in an hour, i need to get changed and meet up with Haru.", Makoto said walking over to his bed, unknowingly looming over a tiny speck.

You blushed as the giant stomped closer, his face becoming blocked by his buff torso. The gentle green eyes of the brunette looked down at his bed. However, Makoto wasn't looking at you, rather the item you were on.

11533311.content:
In a world full of magic, you stood out in an odd way. Your name was Shu and were only one inch tall, due to an abnormal magic birth defect. You were raised in an orphanage alongside your friend, Asta.

Asta loved to tease you for your size, he'd step on you on purpose and shove you under his armpits for fun, it was a good thing that you were extremely durable. Despite Asta picking on you, you still admired his hard work, and his muscular body as well.

Asta also cared about you, but due to your size and his lack of magic, you guessed that he liked to mess with you due to him being so much bigger than you.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

"Yo Shu!" Asta greeted you.

"Hey Asta, how's training going?"

Asta was shirtless and dripping with sweat as he flexed his biceps and grinned down at you mischievously.

"Pretty good!" Asta shouted gleefully, clearly showing off his massive body to you.

Asta walked closer to you, his bare feet shaking the ground. Asta snickered as he reached down and plucked you up. Asta held you in front of his muscular pecs as you felt his body heat from within his hand.

"I just noticed I haven't spent a lotta time with you lately! We should catch up, right little guy?" Asta held back a laugh as you nodded.

"Yeah... well, what do you want to do?" You asked nervously.

"I was thinkin' maybe..."
11533311.title: Asta

choices: Asta put you in another muscle
Asta left you in his pecs
115333112.content:
Asta grinned widely as he flexed a bicep, making the muscle clenched and droop bits of sweat.

"I've been missing our workouts, it feels good when I'm pumping my muscles with you!"

You remembered the workouts, Asta usually did his sit ups or push ups with you stuffed somewhere on his buff body.

"I wanna feel your tiny body between my muscles again!", Asta closed his eyes and showed his teeth with his grin.

You looked in awe as Asta lightly bounced his firm pecs and started to bring you closer. "Shu your been in my pecs a lot so well start here!"

Your tiny body was soon slid into the musky crevice. Asta's firm muscle surrounded you and squeezed as you slid down the sweaty pecs. Soon you were held in place and heard Asta laugh as he felt your tiny body between his muscles.

"Yosh! Let's test your durability Shu!", Asta grinned as he remembered all the times he put his friend beneath him by stepping on him or letting his body fall on Shu.

You groaned as the pecs started squeezing you as they bounced, rubbing you while increasing the force. It didn't really hurt due to your durability, you did feel the strong pressure though.

"Alright let's turn it up!", Asta enthusiastically yelled as he crossed his toned arms over his chest.

The loud boy huffed as he flexed to increase the pressure on his pecs. He felt your tiny body still holding up against his muscle power. Asta laughed as he pumped his muscles again.

"HAHA I forgot how fun this was Shu!"

Soon....
115333112.title: The Loud Muscles

choices: Asta used you as a stick of deodorant.
Asta put his arm down to squash you into his armpit.
1153331121.content:
After a bit of squishing you between his massive pecs, Asta plucked you out from between the sweaty muscles and grinned down at you.

"C-Can we do something else now?" You asked as you were out of breath, not to mention the soreness from being crushed between two giant, mountainous pecs.

"Yep!" Asta's friendly grin turned into a devilish grin before he laid on the ground and brought you down to his abdomen.

"What are you doing now?" You asked as you were passed over Asta's giant stretch of abs.

"I think it'd be funny if I put you down here while I did some sit-ups!" Asta laughed before lowering you and smushing you between his abs.

Your body was stuck in between Asta's abs as they held you in place. Asta rested his arms behind his head and lifted up.

"One!" Asta grunted as he felt your body being compressed by his muscles, "Hang in there little buddy, maybe you can be as strong as me someday!" The giant laughed.

"Two! Three! Four! Five!...." Asta continued to do sit-ups as you were repeatedly squished between his abs, eventually, Asta had reached fifty and took a break.

With his arms still behind his head and you still stuck in his abs, Asta caught a whiff of his exposed armpits.

"Ick... hehehehe" Asta looked down at his abs and used his right arm to pluck you out of the muscles, holding you above his mischievous face.

"Ugh... I'm so tired, can I take a break too?" You asked, panting from the intense 'workout.'

"Sure! You can take a break!" Asta said gleefully.

"Thanks..." You sighed in relief.

"...In my armpit!" Asta chuckled as your eyes widened and you stared down at Asta's giant, hairy, sweaty pit below.

"What?! No way! Let go of me Asta this isn't funny anymore!" You demanded.

"Hahahah! You're so funny Shu, you think you can tell me what to do?" Asta laughed as you gave up trying to wiggle out of his fingers.

Asta lowered you down to his giant armpit, gleefully watching as he pressed you into the soft, fuzzy skin. Your body sank into the skin of Asta's pit as you gagged from the intense smell.

You were familiar with Asta's pits as the giant male used to constantly stuff you into them, but this was the first time in a while, not to mention how much more muscular he'd gotten and his new intense training...
1153331121.title: Abs For Days

115333211.content:
Your name was Dasai, a pro hero with a quirk that truly reflected you. It was called small stature and like it implied, you were only a inch in height.

Being so small may seem to contradict the idea of coming to rescue someone. But your quirk was rather useful in working stealth and acquiring information. What's more is your quirk came with high durability, so any villain that tried snuffing you out failed.

Still despite being a hero you weren't given that much respect. Citizens often unknowingly stomped on you and even pro heroes were oblivious. Like when you spent a meeting getting squeezed between the massive thighs of Endeavor.

You were still inspired to help others from a chat you got to have with the No.1 hero All Might. Vividly you remembered sitting like a pea on his large palm as he gave you his signature smile and said you worked hard and deserved to be a hero.

A new exciting prospect came up as you'd been given a job prospect to come help teach at U.A high school!

The day for your new job soon arrived and...
115333211.title: A Hero

115333212.content:
Your name was Hudo, a new member of an up-and-coming group of villains known as "Dark Mantis."

These villains were unique, they all had quirks related to size. Your quirk was an interesting one, you were one inch in height. All of your life you were treated differently due to your quirk, and you were ready to take it out on the annoying heroes that ignored you time and time again.

Your leader was Shen, a man with the power to change the size of anything just with a touch. You were assigned as the stealth member of the group, and your first assignment was about to begin.

"Are you ready, Hudo?" Shen asked.

You nodded your head. "Yes, I'm ready."

Shen reached down and wrapped a giant hand around you. "Just a reminder, the mission you were assigned is to sneak into the office of U. A's principle and retrieve a few documents inquiring about the upcoming meetup of the biggest heroes in Tokyo."

You gave a thumbs up. "I can do it, I'll just have to have time to fold the papers small enough for me to carry back with me. It'd be easier if I had your quirk."

"Well, this is simply a test to see if you will be valuable to us. If you return empty handed, you will be reduced to my personal servent. If you refuse, I will have to dispose of you, our location cannot be under the risk of being revealed by former members. Do you understand?"

Shen's hand tightened around you as you nodded nervously.

"Good, I will drop you off in front of the school, only a few people should be in the facility, keep your eyes opened for them. Oh, and by the way, I will be watching you through my own means, if you try to abandon your mission you will be caught and disposed of... by me." His brown eyes narrowed down at you.

Shen drove to the front of U.A and you slipped out of the door.

You walked to the front doors and stood confidently. "I can do this."

You slipped underneath the door and made your way to the principle's office, you'd been given directions there on the ride to the school.

Suddenly, you felt giant booms coming from around a corner... it was....
115333212.title: Villain

You felt dread fill you as the mighty force shaking the ground soon revealed itself. From around the corner emerged the ginormous form of the no.1 hero All Might.

The blond giant was in his silver age costume, his large muscles stretched with each of his earth booming stomps. Although you grew up with everyone being a giant All Might was much bigger then any normal giant. His spandex muscular body was like a mountain.

Shen had warned you before about how the no.1 hero was teaching at U.A and to be careful. However you came late in the day and yet the hero was still here! Your leader told you how if All Might spotted him he'd either see you as a bug or a tiny intruder, either one would result in getting crushed by the hero.

All Might meanwhile was unaware of the speck in his path, he simply stomped closer and closer. Looming high above with his signature smile on his muscled body.

You looked up in shock, everything seem to go in slow motion. The white soles of the yellow boots approaching and All Might looming over to where his face was covered by his huge pecs. The giant boot was soon looming over, covering the muscular titan.

Your name was Rantaro, among this world of different and outrageous quirks you got the literal short end of the stick. The quirk you possess is called Downsize, it caused you to be born at a inch tall and when you have a strong peak in emotions your shrunk down further such as a half inch or even a few centimeters. You could regenerate after being crushed, being a red splat in one second and reformed in the next.

Growing up in Musutafu, you were lucky to have two friends growing up named Izuku and Bakigou. Izuku was a kind soul who helped you and always encouraged you to bever give up. The greenete was also quite flustered about your size as whenever he accidentally steps on you he is always apologetic, though you don't mind.

Bakugou was more dominating on the other hand. He mocked you and always made sure to crush you should he have the chance. His bully like nature naturally made you shrink to a cm which Bakugou surely enjoyed as he put you beneath him.

While you were unsure about becoming a hero, the future seemed to shine a light as an opportunity opened up. You were offered a chance to study at U.A highschool the school that Izuku and Bakugou were attending!

Izuku was happy and gave you a hug with his newly gained pecs from his training. Bakugou seemed pissed and crushed you under his big toe before sitting on you to teach a lesson you guessed.

Still arriving at U.A you felt excited and nervous, arriving later in the year not to mention being so tiny.

( https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/seve... )

You panted as you wipped the sweat from your forehead. The large blades of plant life weren't exactly easy to trek through, you probably only got at most 20 feet in the last ten minutes.

To outsiders, it would appear you were braving your way through a jungle of sorts, with the large leaves and everything. In actuality looking from above would show that the "jungle" was in fact grass and you were only a inch tall.

It had been a ordinary morning. After breakfast you pulled up Netflix to watch the anime Seven Deadly Sins, a show you've grown fond of. You soon decided to take a nap, as you drifted of to sleep you blushed as you thought of the sin of greed Ban. It was silly, but you kinda wished you could be in the world of Britannia and get to meet your immortal Husbando.

Waking up had been a shock as surrounding you, tall as buildings was grass. Everything was also different visually, you couldn't explain it but the world just looked......animated.

With no other choices on what to do, you started trekking through the grass to find one of this world's giants.

After a good minute of walking, you stepped out of the tall grass as you stepped onto ground with the green plant just sprouted. Shade was covering the area as a tree's branches blocked the harsh light.

You were surprised at the sight in front of you. Two giant red shoe soles towering over you, crossed at the ankle. Some hope surfaced as you maybe found some help, but upon going around the shoes your jaw dropped.

Ban the Fox's Sin of Greed was resting against the tree, not to mention he was a giant! He had his toned arms folded behind his pale blue hair, his wide armpits with bushy hairs were exposed and sweaty. Ban let out snores as his firm pecs rose and fell, his abs also shifted with each breath. His full glorious torso was nude and had trails of sweat going between the well defined muscles.

You blushed at the sight of the hot immortal boy not only in front of you partially nude, but also a giant. There was a strong temptation to go closer, as you walked up the tightly clothed leg you felt the red leathery outfit.

Taking a breath, you gribbed onto the leather as hard as possible and started to climb up Ban's thigh. Reaching the top, your nose crinkled as it caught the scent of potent b.o coming off of Ban's numerous abs.

Coming closer to the abs, you couldn't help but look up in awe at the trail of muscles to Ban's handsome face. The abs themselves were like hills and touching the warm skin allowed you to feel the mighty muscle and even the gurgling of the immortal's stomach.

Suddenly......
1153332212.title: Ban

115333222.content:
Many people to choose from~

First let's start out with some students.
115333222.title: Assassination Classroom

choices: Karma leaned back and put his feet on the desk
1153332222.content:
You recently got a job at Kunugigaoka Junior High School. Having just finished university you wanted to work as soon as possible, and luckily got a teaching position at the school.

Unfortunately some rather strange occurrences happened just before you went in. A notable one involved a mad scientist using a shrink ray on you, luckily he was caught but the machine was destroyed and the crazed man refused to give away the plans to rebuild it.

In a cruel twist of fate, the government did little to nothing to help you. All you got was a good luck and nearly getting stepped on. With no other choice you had to teach at only a inch tall. The board chairman was somewhat generous, albeit slightly terrifying as he still offered you a spot in teaching the E class.

The students were cool, they at least payed attention when you taught. Not to mention the monster who blew up most of the moon was surprisingly friendly.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

It was the end of the school day and you sat alone in the empty classroom. Koro-Sensei had offered to give you a lift home but you refused on account of air sickness.

The door soon opened and a red haired student entered, Karma Akabane had a covky grin as he walked up to the front desk and looked at everything except you.

"Hmm Sensei should still be here.", Karma his chin before finally looking down. "Ah there you are, sorry Sensei I swear you get smaller every minute!"

You sighed, Karma did tend to tease you in only ways someone could tease a bug. Stepping too close to you, mocking your size, nearly using you as a sweat cushion.

"Hai hai, did you need something Akabane?"

Karma pulled up a chair before sitting and tossing some papers near you. The paper wave casted a wind and blasted you getting a chuckle out of the giant.

"Ne don't be so grumpy, I just needed some help on the assignment!", Karma smirked.

You composed yourself before.....
1153332222.title: Karma

1153332231.content: A world of giant supers is waiting~
1153332231.title: One Punch Man

choices: Suiryu continued to unknowingly squash you
Suiryu felt you under his sole
11533322312.content:
( https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/onep... )

You nervously looked down at your feet as you walked down the hall, anxiousness filled your body and made you have second choices about the quest you set out on. The doors you passed seem to mock you, stretching into the sky and housing giants that could step out and subsequently step on you.

Having high invulnerability was a cool super power to have, however partnered with a inch tall frame wasn't bound to get you take serious in the super hero world. Just out of college you desperately wanted to prove yourself, and so you continued walking down the gigantic hallway.

You soon stood in front of the desired door. This was the home of super fight tournament and martial artist, Suiryu. Martial arts was something you wanted to learn and all dojo masters threatened to crush you should you dare bother them with your pathetic request. So you would try and learn from a idol if yours.

The large door stretched into the sky, deciding to go for it you rushed forward and rammed into the door. A somewhat audiable thud came as you rubbed your sore shoulder. Just as you were about to ram the door again, the ground began shaking with tremors coming from beyond the door.

The door suddenly opened and a shadow was casted over you as the tremors stopped with a large mighty stomp from the towering figure's large foot.

You looked up in awe, all the way up the long black clothed legs. The torso of the giant was nude, half of his numerous abs had sports tape wrapped around them. The large tan pecs partially blocked the face of the handsome Suiryu.

Gulping at the true scale of just how gigantic Suiryu was to your tiny form, you tried gathering courage and yelled.

"S-suiryu-dono please take me as a stu-!"

SQUASH

Turns out your tiny voice didn't reach Suiryu. The giant martial artist took a step forward and unknowingly stomped on you, pressing your tiny body into the ball of his muscled sole. Looking anywhere but down Suiryu sighed before chuckling.

"Hm must've been too nervous to talk to me."

As Suiryu turned and walked back into his home, you could be spotted plastered to the tan sole of the muscular giant. You groaned as the sweaty and smelly sole put all of your idol's muscular weight on you, repeating stomp you more into his large foot.

Soon...
11533322312.title: Suiryu

1153332232.content: Lots of ghoulish figures, they may want more then a bite out of you~
1153332232.title: Tokyo Ghoul

1232.content:
A new season of Total Drama was coming up, but this season would be unlike any other. First of all, it was a season focused on the guys of Total Drama, and secondly instead of two teams each team would only consist of two contestants. You auditioned for the new season, appropriately named "Total Drama: Battle of the Men", and you were extremely excited to get a call that you were accepted to be part of the show!

There was only one thing... you were an inch tall. Your name was Jerry, you were born in an area where radioactive waste had been spilled, which caused a... small issue during your birth. Despite your height, you thought that you may be good for some challenges and you also thought that the guys of TD were attractive, especially Alejandro. You arrived at the new location, an island called "Shuren Isle."

Chris McClain had you hidden away in his pocket as he and the contestants for this season stepped out onto the beach.

"Welcome to Shuren Isle! On this season of Total Drama, the ten of you will compete in five teams of two for the two million dollar prize!" Chris announced.

"Do we get to pick our teammates?" Alejandro asked curiously.

"Funny you ask, Alejandro, there are only nine of you here... and the tenth contestant is a special one." Chris reached into his pocket "And he's your teammate!" He pulled you out, holding you in front of Alejandro.

Alejandro's eyes went wide as he stared at you in confusion. You were starstruck as his giant, attractive face was nearly in your reach.

"Jerry here's a tiny human due to radiation!"

"That sounds familiar..." Mike said.

"Pfft, Alejandro gets stuck with a bug." Duncan smirked at you.

Alejandro plucked you from Chris' hand and looked at you with...
1232.title: Alejandro

124.title: RWBY

choices: He lifted his foot over you
124331.content:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/omni...

Your head spun as you stood up, finding yourself outside of the bar that you had just been in... but something was different, a big difference.

You had somehow shrunk, the last thing that you remembered was drinking and blacking out. You stumbled towards the bar doors, hoping that you were just dreaming.

The bar doors suddenly swung open, and you heard the bar keeper yelling. "That's it, you have to leave!"

You looked up as you saw a giant man drunkenly hobbling out of the doors with a bottle in his hand. "Yeah, yeah, it wasn't my fault he hit me first!"

You quickly dodged as the raven haired giant stomped down towards you, nearly squashing you beneath the sole of his shoe.

What do I do?

Suddenly, a shadow crept over you as the giant peered down at you with a confused look on his face. "What are you, some kinda bug?"

The giant took a swig of his booze.
124331.title: Qrow

choices: Qrow felt the bug not breaking
1243313.content:
Qrow woppled a bit after taking a swing, running a hand through his hair. He looked curiously at the speck before the toe of his dress shoe. Of course from his perspective he couldn't see the clothes you were wearing or the human features, so naturally he assumed you must be an insect.

"Guess i should do this place a favor, no doubt they don't care for bugs.", Qrow quipped taking another swing.

You didn't like the sound of that, no question it brought a bad feeling. This was confirmed as Qrow leaned to his side before lifting up his large foot into the air. The heeled dress shoe sole hung over, the heel looking as large as a bus.

Qrow have a smile as he rose his knee and clenched his free hand. "Sorry little guy can't have you buzzing around, I'll squish you fast ok?"

With no hesitation, Qrow brought his dress shoe down covering your view of his handsome face as the black sole filled your vision and stomped you to the ground.

By some miracle you weren't crushed into a bloody splat, the dirty leather of the sole was pressing you into the ground. However while you felt Qrow's weight pinning you down with his shoe you didn't feel as if you would snap any of your bones.

Qrow sighed as he took a small sip from his flask, glancing down at the foot he was leaning on. "Defeated Grimm and a bug, whatta day."

Lifted up his heel, Qrow started swiveling his foot to make sure he firmly crushed you. You groaned as the shoe grinded you beneath it like a cigarette, feeding the pressure increase.

Suddenly...
1243313.title: Drunken Stomp

info.brief_description: Your favorite animated guys from Anime, Disney etc. are huge
info.description: You've been transported to another world... an animated world to be exact. There's only one catch: you're tiny! What kind of situations will you get in with the giant men in this animated world? That's for you to decide. You can also insert yourself as a character in the series, if you'd like. Anything goes except for scat, also male interactions only.
